about_the_game: When an ancient evil is awoken by a most certainly odd cult, a boy must venture from his home to save his mum (and also the world...). Cairn: Mathair's Curse is an RPG inspired by 90's JRPG's and Scottish humour. Explore a variety of locations and fight strange and unusual enemies.
detailed_description: When an ancient evil is awoken by a most certainly odd cult, a boy must venture from his home to save his mum (and also the world...). Cairn: Mathair's Curse is an RPG inspired by 90's JRPG's and Scottish humour. Explore a variety of locations and fight strange and unusual enemies.
